info.title: Professional Managed Account Enrollment
info.description: API for professional Managed account enrollment in DC plans.

get.description: This returns the professional managment account fee details . It call third party vendor Financial Engine API and fetch the details from there.

parameters.name: alightRequestHeader
parameters.description: alight Request Header. Please use systemTickets array to log FeSessionToken in alightRequestHeader if there is already a session created with FE. You can get this FeSessionToken from previous request alightResponseHeader to FE.

alightResponseHeader.description: systemTickets array in response header will be containing feSessionToken which need to be used in any further API call to FE. In same systemTickets array will also have x-amzn-requestid key which will unique id coming from FE side for each request.

get.description: This returns the professional managment account legal documents links.

parameters.name: alightRequestHeader
parameters.description: Request Header. Please use systemTickets array to log FeSessionToken in alightRequestHeader if there is already session created for that. You can get this FeSessionToken from previous request alightResponseHeader to FE

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: Specify context for Managed Accounts or Online Advice. MA or OA

alightResponseHeader.description: systemTickets array in response header will be contain feSessionToken which need to be used in any further API call to FE. In same systemTickets array will also have x-amzn-requestid key which will unique id coming from FE side for each request.

500.description: Unsucessful request. Please see responsebody for specfic error which occured at FE side

post.description: Enrolls ppt in professional managed account at third party side

parameters.name: alightRequestHeader
parameters.description: Request Header. Please use systemTickets array to log FeSessionToken in alightRequestHeader if there is already session created for that. You can get this FeSessionToken from previous request alightResponseHeader to FE.

alightResponseHeader.description: systemTickets array in response header will be contain feSessionToken which need to be used in any further API call to FE. In same systemTickets array will also have x-amzn-requestid key which will unique id coming from FE side for each request.

systemTickets array in response header will be contain feSessionToken which need to be used in any further API call to FE. In same systemTickets array will also have x-amzn-requestid key which will unique id coming from FE side for each request.

feeScheduleTiers.description: Contains data required for the business process

lowerThanIndustryPercentValue.description: Whole number that expresses how the highest basis point rate on the sponsor fee schedule compares to the market fee schedule (where market fee schedule defaults to 100 basis points but is configurable via setting market-fee-basis-points at the provider level). In other words, how much lower than market fee schedule is the sponsor fee schedule? RoundingMode CEILING always rounds to a whole number, in multiples of 5. The whole number and percent sign is returned as a string.

lowerRangeAmount.description: lower balance in the fee tier.

higherRangeAmount.description: higher balance in the fee tier. Zero means no boundary.

ratePeriodFrequency.description: Sample rate period frequency. MONTHLY is default, but is configurable via setting comm_fee_example_period at sponsor level. MONTHLY, QUARTER, ANNUAL

sampleAmount.description: $10000 is default, but is configurable via setting comm_fee_example_balance at sponsor level

sampleFeePerPeriod.description: Result, in dollars, of calculating (sampleAmount x feeRate)/ratePeriodFrequency .CEILING always rounds up to the next cent. This will be based upon ratePeriodFrequency.

feeRate.description: Always represents basis points and not dollars; error response code 500 is returned if in dollars. Supports values to the ten thousandths place.

legalDocuments.description: Contains data required for the business process

messageCode.description: code for sucessfull enrollement. It can be ENROLL or ENROLL_PLUS_INVESTMENT_OBJECTIVE_SET_TO_INCOME

message.description: message from third party after election.

status.description: code for unsucessfull enrollement. It can be SPONSOR_NOT_ACTIVE_MA_SPONSOR or PLAN_OWNER_NOT_IN_PRODUCTION or NO_ACCOUNT_ALLOWS_MA or many other value which can help in identify the reason.

message.description: message from third party after unsucessfull enrollement.
message.example: client have a hold preventing deafult
